00033 #include <OpenImageIO/fmath.h>
00034 
00035 #include <OSL/genclosure.h>
00036 
00037 #include "osl_closures.h"
00038 
00039 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00040 
00041 using namespace OSL;
00042 
00049 
00050 class DebugClosure : public ClosurePrimitive {
00051 public:
00052     ustring m_tag;
00053 
00054     DebugClosure () : ClosurePrimitive (Debug) { }
00055 
00056     bool mergeable (const ClosurePrimitive *other) const {
00057         const DebugClosure *comp = (const DebugClosure *)other;
00058         return m_tag == comp->m_tag &&
00059             ClosurePrimitive::mergeable(other);
00060     }
00061 
00062     size_t memsize () const { return sizeof(*this); }
00063 
00064     const char *name () const { return "debug"; }
00065 
00066     void print_on (std::ostream &out) const {
00067         out << name() << " (\"" << m_tag.c_str() << "\")";
00068     }
00069 
00070 };
00071 
00072 ClosureParam closure_debug_params[] = {
00073     CLOSURE_STRING_PARAM(DebugClosure, m_tag),
00074     CLOSURE_STRING_KEYPARAM("label"),
00075     CLOSURE_FINISH_PARAM(DebugClosure) };
00076 
00077 CLOSURE_PREPARE(closure_debug_prepare, DebugClosure)
00078 
00079 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
